kjv_def: abide, continue, dwell, endure, be present, remain, stand, tarry (for), X thine own
strongs_def: to stay (in a given place, state, relation or expectancy)
outline:
1. to remain, abide
    1. in reference to place
      1. to sojourn, tarry
      2. not to depart
        1. to continue to be present
        2. to be held, kept, continually
      3. in reference to time
        1. to continue to be, not to perish, to last, endure
          1. of persons, to survive, live
        2. in reference to state or condition
          1. to remain as one, not to become another or different
        3. to wait for, await one
